name: Parlor! Pro 7
overview: Parlor! Pro 7 is the seventh game of the series of the same name released for the Playstation console and is a gambling game that features 3 different gambling machines. In the Reach Gallery Mode the player can see the machines animations. The game features also a sort of a story mode (called "Hall Mode) in which the player is a pachinko gambler that goes around the different pachinko places and try to win a lot of money in the machines to win prizes. The game features different shops and gambling places to go.
